name: ModMe: Better Posts
description: General tweaks for the official ModMe forum. ModMe is created by Avia Creations and is available here: http://aviacreations.com/modme/storehome.php Contact Steam Email
additional_info: Options: Avatar/Signature show and hide are self explanatory. Hide Default Avatar hides the avatars from those without one specified on their account. Minimal chat style removes the avatars and formatting lines from the chat to make it look more like an IRC style chat. You can view many more messages on one screen due to this feature and I personally find it the most useful. Hardcore mode downsizes all emojis and compresses text even further. If you are a moderator, please specify yes when asked or you may have buttons overlay with the page numbers on topics. Text style allows you to compress the text, this sets the line height back to default so that there is less vertical space in-between text on the forum. This affects ALL text on ModMe. If you are using Compressed Text and Minimal Chat, this is the equivalent of hardcore minimal and you will need to select the hardcore minimal chat option or your chat messages will be slightly misaligned. Updates Dec 3rd: Chat massively improved. Color customizer style now available. Various improvements. Aug 27th: Applied post box changes to PM pages Aug 20th Hotfix: Added compatibility for ModMe moderators or higher ranks Removed code box change due to it being now obsolete Aug. 19th Update: Numbering in code boxes is now correct Avatar changes now apply to Profile pages v3: Chat IRC/compressed mode v2: - Avatar options - Signature options v1: - Avatars are now allowed a max size of 128x450 pixels. - Profile Information is moved to under the avatar - Signature is now centered.
